vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σιλουανός
(in MSS also Σιλβανός, a form frequently in π.), -οῦ, ὁ,
Silvanus, latinized name of Silas: 2Co.1:19, 1Th.1:1, 2Th.1:1, 1Pe.5:12.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.15.22; also called Silvanus at 2Co.1.19; 3x
§ Silas, Silvanus, "asked for" possibly "dedicated to God"
Silvanus, (Proper name), 2Cor. 1:19; 1Thess. 1:1; 2Thess. 1:1; 1Pet. 5:12, see Σιλας*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Silvano (probablemente la misma persona que Silas)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西拉 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "樹木茂盛的"
羅馬公民, 是使徒保羅在一些宣教旅程中的同工.
與 4609 是同一個人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西拉 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "树木茂盛的"
罗马公民, 是使徒保罗在一些宣教旅程中的同工.
与 4609 是同一个人
